scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook, chiefly newspaper clippings of H.L. Mencken (1880-1956) and Frank Richardson Kent (1877-1958) articles published in the Baltimore Evening Sun[the newsclippings were all copied onto permalife paper maintaining their original arrangement for preservation purposes], 2 folders. Newsclippings (EC)
Articles by H.L. Mencken published in the Baltimore Evening Sun, removed from the scrapbook described above. Newsclippings.
